abstract.text: Combines elements from three other publishers and delivers groups of elements as tuples.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: A publisher that emits groups of elements from the upstream publishers as tuples.

to return a new publisher that combines the elements from three other publishers to publish a tuple to the downstream subscriber. The returned publisher waits until all four publishers have emitted an event, then delivers the oldest unconsumed event from each publisher as a tuple to the subscriber.
receives the oldest unconsumed value from each publisher and combines them into a tuple that it republishes to the downstream:

code: numbersPub.send(1)         // numbersPub: 1       lettersPub:        emojiPub:       fractionsPub:         zip output: <none>
numbersPub.send(2)         // numbersPub: 1,2     lettersPub:        emojiPub:       fractionsPub:         zip output: <none>
numbersPub.send(3)         // numbersPub: 1,2,3   lettersPub:        emojiPub:       fractionsPub:         zip output: <none>
fractionsPub.send(0.1)     // numbersPub: 1,2,3   lettersPub: "A"    emojiPub:       fractionsPub: 0.1     zip output: <none>
lettersPub.send("A")       // numbersPub: 1,2,3   lettersPub: "A"    emojiPub:       fractionsPub: 0.1     zip output: <none>
emojiPub.send("😀")        // numbersPub: 2,3     lettersPub: "A"    emojiPub: "😀"  fractionsPub: 0.1     zip output: (1, "A", "😀", 0.1)
lettersPub.send("B")       // numbersPub: 2,3     lettersPub: "B"    emojiPub:       fractionsPub:         zip output: <none>
fractionsPub.send(0.8)     // numbersPub: 2,3     lettersPub: "B"    emojiPub:       fractionsPub: 0.8     zip output: <none>
emojiPub.send("🥰")        // numbersPub: 3       lettersPub: "B"    emojiPub:       fractionsPub: 0.8     zip output: (2, "B", "🥰", 0.8)

inlineContent.text: If any upstream publisher finishes successfully or fails with an error, so too does the zipped publisher.

Combine-PageImage-card.png.alt: The Swift language logo, overlaid by a graph of interconnected lines and points.

abstract.text: Customize handling of asynchronous events by combining event-processing operators.
A subject that broadcasts elements to downstream subscribers.
Declares that a type can transmit a sequence of values over time.
The kind of errors this publisher might publish.
Combines elements from three other publishers and delivers groups of elements as tuples.
A namespace for types that serve as publishers.
A publisher that republishes items from another publisher only if each new item is in increasing order from the previously-published item.
Combines elements from another publisher and deliver pairs of elements as tuples.
Combines elements from another publisher and delivers a transformed output.
Combines elements from two other publishers and delivers groups of elements as tuples.
Combines elements from two other publishers and delivers a transformed output.
Combines elements from three other publishers and delivers groups of elements as tuples.
Combines elements from three other publishers and delivers a transformed output.
A publisher created by applying the zip function to four upstream publishers.
